attributes.action: Better Fund the NHS and emergency services instead of funding a royal wedding
attributes.background: The NHS is struggling police cuts on our streets other emergency services are struggling because we have no money yet we are finding a royal wedding

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want the Government to invest more in the NHS, you may wish to sign this petition instead:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/208837

If you want the Government to ensure that the cost of the Royal Wedding is not met from public funds, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/206490
